entry.title: Dubai Clarifies Rules for Crypto Companies
entry.summary: A new rulebook aims to attract crypto businesses and investors to the Emirate.

entry.title: Robinhood Wants to Buy Its Shares Back from Sam Bankman-Fried
entry.summary: The FTX founder purchased a 7.6% stake in Robinhood through a holding company.

entry.title: Satoshi-Era Bitcoin Address Moves $9.6 Million in BTC After 11 Years
entry.summary: Assuming the coins were sold, the owner reaped a 120,000,000% profit.

entry.title: SEC Investigating Crypto Exchange Kraken Over Securities Violations
entry.summary: The crypto exchange is the latest to be targeted by the SEC, according to reports.

entry.title: Brave Adds Support For Solana on iOS and Android
entry.summary: The privacy-centric browser company aims to provide a one-stop shop for Web3 services.

entry.title: FTX Lawyers Can Now Subpoena Sam Bankman-Fried's Group of 'Insiders'
entry.summary: Some FTX insiders have cooperated, but the restructuring team said "key questions" about the company's finances remain unanswered.

entry.title: Craig Wright Loses Bitcoin Copyright Claim
entry.summary: The computer scientist had asserted that Bitcoin forks breached his intellectual property rights.

entry.title: Aptos Plans Network Upgrade, 'More Clarity' Around Token Distribution
entry.summary: Aptos hopes to "provide a little bit more clarity and more details behind the principles" of the cryptocurrency's tokenomics, says co-founder Mo Shaikh.

entry.title: Def Jam Creates NFT Band With Solana’s Catalina Whale Mixer
entry.summary: The Whales will be based on avatars from the Solana NFT project, with tunes coming through both traditional and Web3 channels.

entry.title: Hermès Beats MetaBirkin NFT Creator in Trademark Lawsuit
entry.summary: The luxury brand’s victory over an unauthorized digital Birkin bag creator may set a precedent for IP protections in the NFT world.

entry.title: Chiliz Launches Native Blockchain in Shift Away From 'Just Being a Token': CEO
entry.summary: Marking its fifth anniversary, sports-focused crypto startup Chiliz has officially unveiled its own layer-1 EVM-compatible blockchain.

entry.title: Gamers Are Paying Thousands for High Scores in Yuga Labs' Dookey Dash
entry.summary: With cheating rampant in Yuga Labs’ new Dookey Dash game, some players are shelling out big bucks for top scores.

entry.title: 3AC Liquidators Ask Judge to Intervene, Say Co-Founder Is 'Withholding Information'
entry.summary: 3AC liquidators allege Kyle Davies “continues to withhold information" while "shamelessly" raising millions to launch a new crypto exchange.

entry.title: Revolut Launches Crypto Staking for Ethereum, Cardano, Polkadot, and Tezos
entry.summary: The staking service is the latest from challenger bank Revolut in its ongoing push to make inroads in the crypto industry.

entry.title: The Sandbox Soars 24%, Leading Metaverse Token Rally
entry.summary: Several metaverse-related tokens are flying high on Wednesday, with The Sanbox's SAND posting 24% gains over the day.

entry.title: What Are AI Tokens?
entry.summary: AI tokens are building momentum but nonetheless face challenges.

entry.title: SEC Says Monitoring Advisors Shilling Crypto a Top Priority in 2023
entry.summary: The SEC said it will be examining crypto brokers and advisors to ensure adequate risk management and “standards of care.”

entry.title: With 11,000 NFTs Minted to Bitcoin, Are Bitcoin Maxis Coming Around?
entry.summary: The controversial Ordinals project continues to divide the Bitcoin community.

entry.title: SBF Lobbied Congress to Benefit FTX, Not Crypto, Says Blockchain Exec
entry.summary: Kristin Smith, head of the Blockchain Association, says Sam Bankman-Fried “was making our job very difficult.”

entry.title: From $8 Mint to $4K Flip: Open Edition NFTs Are Reenergizing the Market
entry.summary: Checks and other popular open edition NFT projects are grabbing traders with low prices, gamification, and memes.

entry.title: ConsenSys Backs Lawsuit Against IRS Over Taxing Staked Crypto
entry.summary: A crypto couple from Tennessee is appealing a judge’s dismissal of their case in October.

entry.title: US Prosecutors Want to Delay CFTC, SEC Fraud Cases Against Sam Bankman-Fried
entry.summary: U.S. Prosecutor Damian Williams doesn't want SBF's defense team to "circumvent the criminal discovery rules" by way of the civil fraud cases.

entry.title: Millions in Crypto Donations Pour Into Turkey Following Devastating Earthquakes
entry.summary: The Web3 community is again raising millions within hours to help those in need.

entry.title: Bitcoin Pops, Then Drops as Fed Chief Powell Says Beating Inflation Will 'Take Time'
entry.summary: Powell today said that there will be “significant declines in inflation” this year, but there's no guarantee it will be easy.

entry.title: CryptoPunk, Bored Ape Sell for Over $1M Each as NFT Market Rebounds
entry.summary: The NFT resurgence continues with a pair of high-value trades following data showing a significant bump in recent sales activity.

entry.title: BIS Project 'Pyxtrial' Developing Tool to Monitor Stablecoin Reserves
entry.summary: Of the various crypto projects under the BIS umbrella, Pyxtrial is developing a platform to "better monitor stablecoin's balance sheets."

entry.title: Judge Rejects Request to Ease Restrictions on Sam Bankman-Fried's Communications
entry.summary: Use of FaceTime, iMessage, Zoom, texts, and email would be allowed.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miners Hut 8, US Bitcoin Corp to Merge in All-Stock Deal
entry.summary: The move comes as more mining companies suffer through the crypto winter.

entry.title: Financial Institutions Are Still Betting on Crypto—Even After Getting Rekt in 2022
entry.summary: Crypto is down, but the big dogs are not getting out.

entry.title: Cryptex Finance's New Index Token to Track Top 10 NFT Collections
entry.summary: Using price feed data from Chainlink and Coinbase, the JPEGz index token offers users access to ten of the leading NFT projects on the market.

entry.title: Former Coinbase Manager Pleads Guilty to Insider Trading
entry.summary: Ishan Wahi pleaded guilty to two charges of conspiracy to commit wire fraud.

entry.title: Signature Bank Lawsuit Alleges It 'Substantially Facilitated' FTX Fraud
entry.summary: The recent class-action lawsuit has accused Signature Bank of helping the "now-bankrupt infamous FTX fraud."

entry.title: Ethereum Staking Platform Lido Finance Rolls Out Details of Next Upgrade
entry.summary: Lido Finance released fresh details about the project’s incoming upgrade focused on withdrawing Ethereum and decentralizing its validators.

entry.title: WeTransfer Turns to NFTs in Tie Up With Blockchain Firm Minima
entry.summary: The partnership will leverage Minima’s soon-to-launch network, letting users share and monetize their NFTs.

entry.title: ‘Britcoin’ Consultation Lays Groundwork for UK’s Digital Pound
entry.summary: Officials are moving ahead with plans to roll out a digital pound, adding that the launch of a "Britcoin" could happen in the next few years.

entry.title: AI Crypto Tokens Fetch, Singularity Rally More Than 20% Overnight
entry.summary: As the artificial intelligence narrative grows louder, several AI-adjacent cryptocurrencies have enjoyed hefty rallies.

entry.title: Will There Be Crypto Ads in the Super Bowl This Year?
entry.summary: Crypto firms gobbled up airtime in 2022, but they will be significantly less visible this time around.

entry.title: Gemini, Genesis Reach $100 Million Agreement Over Earn Program
entry.summary: DCG will also exchange a $1.1 billion note for stock and refinance $1 billion in loans.

entry.title: Giannis Antetokounmpo NFT Sells for Record-Breaking $187K on Sorare NBA
entry.summary: It can’t match the gargantuan sale price of the Bucks star’s top physical card sale, but it smashes the previous Sorare NBA record.

entry.title: FTX Bankruptcy Lawyers Say Independent Examiner Would Put Assets at Risk
entry.summary: "With all due respect, the U.S. Trustee's Office views this as if we have a warehouse full of sacks of potatoes," FTX's attorney said.

entry.title: Bill Murray Discusses NFT Project, First Members-Only Event
entry.summary: Comedic legend Bill Murray sits down with Decrypt at his first exclusive party for NFT holders in Oceanside, California. He describes the project’s origins and why it didn’t feel “mercenary” for him to create an NFT-based membership club.

entry.title: gm: Kristin Smith and the Crypto Crusade in Washington
entry.summary: Kristin Smith is Executive Director of the Blockchain Association, which advocates for crypto policy in Washington D.C.—an exhausting effort that Sam Bankman-Fried was closely involved in, until he set it all on fire. Kristin tells Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott how SBF and FTX set things back, but there are still positive signs from crypto friendly voices in Congress.

entry.title: gm: Week in Review: Tech Layoffs, Porsche NFTs, Ted Cruz
entry.summary: In our January 28, 2023 week in review episode, Dan Roberts, Matthew Diemer, and Kate Irwin talk about more layoffs in crypto and broader tech (including how Google botched its layoffs), the NFT market rebound and Porsche’s NFT drop (fail or surprise success?), Sam Bankman-Fried’s latest claims about FTX US and the surprising list of big companies on the FTX creditor list, and Ted Cruz’s weird effort to get DC vendors to accept Bitcoin. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: How Web3 Is Disrupting Video Streaming: Myco, Theta Labs, and Actor David Bianchi
entry.summary: At an investor event in L.A. hosted by watch-to-earn video streaming platform Myco, Decrypt's Sander Lutz moderated a discussion about Film3 with Myco CCO Phil McKenzie, Theta Labs BD Head Andrea Berry, and actor and filmmaker David Bianchi, whose Web3 series "RZR" got funding through NFT drops.

entry.title: How Web3 and NFTs Are Disrupting Film: Myco, Livepeer, Ava Labs, Bad Grrls Creative Club
entry.summary: At an investor event in New York hosted by the watch-to-earn video streaming platform Myco, Decrypt's Dan Roberts moderated a lively chat about Film3 with Phil McKenzie from Myco, Toni Thai Sterrett the founder of NFT member collective Bad Grrls Creative Club, Doug Petkanics the founder of decentralized video hosting platform Livepeer, and Daniel Killeen of Avalanche blockchain developer Ava Labs.

entry.title: 'Iron Man' Comic Artist Sean Chen on Marvel vs. Web3
entry.summary: Marvel and DC Comics alum Sean Chen argues that while studios have made billions, comic artists aren't seeing even a fraction of that wealth.

entry.title: Marvel Artist Sean Chen on How Artificial Intelligence Will Shape Comics
entry.summary: "Eventually there's still a human brain that needs to be involved," Chen said of AI being used to create comics.

entry.title: Actor David Bianchi Previews His Web3 TV Series 'RZR'
entry.summary: Veteran actor David Bianchi spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson right before a public table read for Bianchi's upcoming drama series "RZR," to be distributed through Gala Films. The show is already greenlit and will be set in a dystopian future Los Angeles, with Ethereum and other digital assets as part of the plot. Bianchi also conducted two NFT drops to build engagement from fans.

entry.title: gm: Farokh and the Rug Radio Roadmap
entry.summary: Meet Mr. NFT: @Farokh, who preaches daily to hundreds of thousands of NFT faithful, and is trying to building Rug Radio into a fully formed Web3 media company. Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin from the gm podcast talk to Farokh about Rug DAO and all things NFT culture. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: gm: Big Bold Predictions for Crypto in 2023
entry.summary: Will Sam Bankman-Fried serve prison time? Who will be the next crypto company to go bankrupt, or the next founder to see their reputation dissolve? Will we get a new crypto law this year? Decrypt's Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Matthew Diemer of the gm podcast crew kicked off the new year by trading predictions for 2023. Watch and make sure to subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
